member.name: M:LogsDemo.API.Controllers.LogController.GetUserLog(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Get log by log Id and user id
member.param: User id that belongs this log

member.name: M:LogsDemo.API.Controllers.LogController.GetUserLogs(System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{LogsDemo.Domain.Enums.LogSeverity},System.Nullable{LogsDemo.Domain.Enums.LogType})
member.param: User Id the owns logs [ Required ]
From date in format [yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss.tt] e.x "2018-11-07 20:13:22.428 [Optional]"
To date in format [yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss.tt] e.x "2018-11-07 20:13:22.428 [Optional]"
Severity of log {Low = 0, Medium = 1, High = 2, Etc } [Optional]
Type of log { Debug = 0, Trace = 1, Info = 2, Etc } [Optional]
